data.title: International SMS
data.meta_description: Need to communicate through SMS to your international contacts? Iwin enables you to send and receive SMSes to hundreds of countries throughout the world easily and cost effectively!
data.text:
Using Iwin you can send SMSes to international countries. Have a look at our list below to see which countries are supported.

Send and receive international messages. Iwin gives you the ability to receive reply SMSes from your customers. Subject to availability per country.

Have a look at Iwin’s international pricing tables to calculate how many SMS credits each SMS will use per country.

Buy Iwin SMS credits using your credit card or with an EFT. Your SMS credits will never expire on Iwin, which saves you money!

View SMS replies from your clients for each SMS campaign you send. Generate multiple types of reports to track your SMS campaigns.

Iwin supports multiple country codes. Have a look at our list to make sure that you have the correct code for the country to which you wish to send.

Start messaging with Iwin quickly and easily. Iwin can help you reach your international audience and help your business rocket!

Integrate with us using our REST API, which can be accessed on the Iwin portal and customize Iwin’s messaging solution to your needs.

Unlike mobile apps, or use of the internet, where compatible software and data usage limits are key limiting factors, SMS enables you to send marketing campaigns to practically any phone.

SMS delivery to your target market is instantaneous. SMS also uses the GSM Network Control Plane. When data networks fail and base stations are still up, you will still reach your audience.

Your target audience has a higher likelihood of engaging with your brand when reaching out with targeted mobile communication.

SMS marketing is not only a more engaging marketing method, but it is also more likely to drive responses. With Iwin you can reach your target audience with a high engagement rate.

Regulations around SMS and mobile communications are not restrictive. Consumers have the ability with Iwin to opt out from any bulk communication sources.
